name: Lead Scoring & Qualification

parameters.jsCode:
const leadData = $input.first().json; // Create personalized email based on lead score and qualification let emailTemplate; let subject; if (leadData.qualificationLevel === 'Hot Lead') { subject = `ðŸŒŸ Premium Booking Inquiry - ${leadData.originalData.celebrityName || 'Celebrity Booking'}`; emailTemplate = `

Thank you for your premium booking inquiry!

Dear ${leadData.originalData.clientName},

We've received your high-priority booking request and have immediately assigned our premium concierge team to assist you.

Your Booking Details:

  • Event: ${leadData.originalData.eventType}
  • Date: ${leadData.originalData.eventDate}
  • Attendees: ${leadData.originalData.attendees}
  • Budget Range: ${leadData.originalData.budgetRange}

Next Steps:

  • âœ… Your inquiry has been prioritized (Lead Score: ${leadData.score}/100)
  • ðŸ“ž Our premium agent will contact you within 30 minutes
  • ðŸ’Ž You'll receive a detailed proposal within 2 hours

Best regards,
Premium Booking Team

`; } else if (leadData.qualificationLevel === 'Warm Lead') { subject = `Your Celebrity Booking Inquiry - ${leadData.originalData.celebrityName || 'Professional Event'}`; emailTemplate = `

Thank you for your booking inquiry!

Dear ${leadData.originalData.clientName},

We've received your booking request and will have one of our experienced agents contact you soon.

Your Event Details:

  • Event Type: ${leadData.originalData.eventType}
  • Date: ${leadData.originalData.eventDate}
  • Location: ${leadData.originalData.location}

What happens next:

  • ðŸ“‹ We'll review your requirements in detail
  • ðŸ“ž Our team will contact you within 2 hours
  • ðŸ“Š You'll receive a customized proposal

Best regards,
Booking Team

`; } else { subject = `Celebrity Booking Information - ${leadData.originalData.eventType}`; emailTemplate = `

Thank you for your interest!

Dear ${leadData.originalData.clientName},

We've received your inquiry about celebrity booking services.

Our team will review your request and get back to you within 24 hours with more information about how we can help make your event memorable.

In the meantime, feel free to browse our celebrity roster and event planning resources on our website.

Best regards,
Customer Service Team

`; } return { to: leadData.originalData.clientEmail, subject: subject, html: emailTemplate, leadId: leadData.leadId, priority: leadData.priority };
